title: Cut your home heating costs
creator_credit: Rodale Press, Auska Videobooks, Jeff Cox, John Hoskyns-Abrahall, Dave Herman and Barbara Anson
brief_description: A two part program that looks at ways to cut your home heating costs. Pt 1. How to keep the heat in your house: Looks at where the most common energy leaks around the home are and how to halt heat loss with weather stripping, caulk, insulation, and window coverings. Pt 2. Wood heat: Examines how to start heating the home with wood. How to evaluate your home’s wood heating capacity, how to select the best stove, how to get more from your fireplace and how to maintain your stove safely are all examined. NB - forms for calculating energy use, mentioned in this video are not available in Australia.
